name: GEDZip Genealogy Data File
summary: A GDZ file is a Zip-compressed archive that includes a FamilySearch .GED file and associated media files, such as pictures and supporting documents. It is created using a GEDZip utility that can be embedded in genealogy software using the specification included in the version 7.0 release of the FamilySearch GEnealogical Data COMmunications (GEDCOM) format. GDZ files allow genealogists to save and exchange genealogical data, including historical pictures and photos, across different genealogy databases and programs.
